examples: the hat is available in either white or maroon

noun.description: A firework that makes a loud bang, used mainly as a signal or warning.

verb.description: Leave (someone) trapped and isolated in an inaccessible place, especially an island.
examples: a novel about schoolboys marooned on a desert island

origin: Mid 17th century: from French marron feral, from Spanish cimarrón wild, (as a noun) runaway slave.
